title: Average living space of PRH tenants Hong Kong 2007 to 2019
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: In general Average living space in square meters per person has stayed the same over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2017.
The highest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 13.2 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 13.0 was reported at Year 2014
min_summary: Overall Average living space in square meters per person has increased over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017.
